Name: El Estribo
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: Pink and creamy but with a tequila kick.
History: The signature drink at El Estribo, Mexico City, which sadly closed in 2005. The drink and this once legendary tequila bar's name 'estribo' is used to say "one for the road" in Mexico... before you get into the stirrups and ride away.
Nutrition: One serving of El Estribo contains 208 calories
